rooms.description: Entrance area with foyer and storage space.
Open Scandinavian-style living room, serving as a multi-purpose space with built-in seating and minimalistic design. Vastu-aligned north-facing for positive energy.
Dedicated home theater area with acoustic panels and low-light LED lighting to enhance viewing experience; located in the south-west to minimize disturbances.
Cozy library space featuring floor-to-ceiling bookshelves; positioned near north-east for intellectual stimulation and positive energy flow.
Functional kitchen with Scandinavian design elements, integrated storage, and a central island. Placed in the east to harness morning light.
Compact bathroom designed for efficiency with minimalist fixtures.
Private area designated for servants or maids, located on the north side to maintain privacy and balance energy.
Small utility room for washing machines and other appliances; positioned in a corner away from main living spaces.
